name: energy-root
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 200 HP. Decreases happiness by 10/10/15.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A bitter root that restores HP by 200 points.
flavor_text.emerald: A bitter root that restores HP by 200 points.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A very bitter root. It restores the HP of one POKéMON by 200 points.
